metadata.title: CVE-2019-10082 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In Apache HTTP Server 2.4.18-2.4.39, using fuzzed network input, the http/2session handling could be made to read memory after being freed, duringconnection shutdown.

criterions.comment: apache2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
apache2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
